Package arc.files

Class FiStream

java.lang.Object
arc.files.Fi
arc.files.FiStream
public abstract class FiStream
extends Fi
A FileHandle intended to be subclassed for the purpose of implementing read() and/or write(boolean). Methods that would manipulate the file instead throw UnsupportedOperationException.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class arc.files.Fi

    file, type

    Create an Files.absolute(java.lang.String) file at the given location.

  • Method Details

    • isDirectory

      public boolean isDirectory()
      Description copied from class: Fi
      Returns true if this file is a directory. Always returns false for classpath files. On Android, an Files.internal(java.lang.String) handle to an empty directory will return false. On the desktop, an Files.internal(java.lang.String) handle to a directory on the classpath will return false.
      Overrides:
      isDirectory in class Fi

    • length

      public long length()
      Description copied from class: Fi
      Returns the length in bytes of this file, or 0 if this file is a directory, does not exist, or the size cannot otherwise be determined.
      Overrides:
      length in class Fi

    • exists

      public boolean exists()
      Description copied from class: Fi
      Returns true if the file exists. On Android, a Files.classpath(java.lang.String) or Files.internal(java.lang.String) handle to a directory will always return false. Note that this can be very slow for internal files on Android!
      Overrides:
      exists in class Fi

    • write

      public java.io.OutputStream write​(boolean overwrite)
      Description copied from class: Fi
      Returns a stream for writing to this file. Parent directories will be created if necessary.
      Overrides:
      write in class Fi
      Parameters:
      overwrite - If false, this file will be overwritten if it exists, otherwise it will be appended.

    • list

      public Fi[] list()
      Description copied from class: Fi
      Returns the paths to the children of this directory. Returns an empty list if this file handle represents a file and not a directory. On the desktop, an Files.internal(java.lang.String) handle to a directory on the classpath will return a zero length array.
      Overrides:
      list in class Fi

    • mkdirs

      public boolean mkdirs()
      Overrides:
      mkdirs in class Fi

    • delete

      public boolean delete()
      Description copied from class: Fi
      Deletes this file or empty directory and returns success. Will not delete a directory that has children.
      Overrides:
      delete in class Fi

    • deleteDirectory

      public boolean deleteDirectory()
      Description copied from class: Fi
      Deletes this file or directory and all children, recursively.
      Overrides:
      deleteDirectory in class Fi

    • copyTo

      public void copyTo​(Fi dest)
      Description copied from class: Fi
      Copies this file or directory to the specified file or directory. If this handle is a file, then 1) if the destination is a file, it is overwritten, or 2) if the destination is a directory, this file is copied into it, or 3) if the destination doesn't exist, Fi.mkdirs() is called on the destination's parent and this file is copied into it with a new name. If this handle is a directory, then 1) if the destination is a file, ArcRuntimeException is thrown, or 2) if the destination is a directory, this directory is copied into it recursively, overwriting existing files, or 3) if the destination doesn't exist, Fi.mkdirs() is called on the destination and this directory is copied into it recursively.
      Overrides:
      copyTo in class Fi

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo​(Fi dest)
      Description copied from class: Fi
      Moves this file to the specified file, overwriting the file if it already exists.
      Overrides:
      moveTo in class Fi
